overview: Regina a journalist and writer, inspired by a special gift, a souvenir reproduction of the Maiden’s Tower on the Bosphorus,  decides to travel to Istanbul to research and write of less known history. Her quest is the demystification of the secrets in  the masterpieces and the fate of the remarkable historical figures. The stories have one thing in common, forbidden love.  Her adventure is full of surprises and challenges, the string of “pearls” becomes a bridge between two civilizations, and  her journey is at the same time a personal “pearl“, culminating in a romance in Macedonia.
title: Pearls Boat
